= Built-in
:url-docs: https://react.dev/reference/react/hooks

{url-docs}[[docs\]]

.State Hooks
* `useState`
* `useReducer`

.Context Hooks
* `useContext`

.Ref Hooks
* `useRef`
* `useImperativeHandle`

.Effect Hooks
* `useEffect`
* `useLayoutEffect`
* `useInsertionEffect`

.Performance Hooks
* `useMemo`
* `useCallback`
* `useTransition`
* `useDeferredValue`

.Other Hooks
* `useDebugValue`
* `useId`
* `useSyncExternalStore`
* `useActionState`
